bioghist.p: Elsie Walker Butterworth lived in Wallingford, Pennsylvania, with her sister Olga Butterworth. They lived in Walker House. Some information in the collection was compiled by Oscar Byram.

scopecontent.p: The collection contains genealogical research related to the Butterworth family and related families. Materials include: verse and notes on English history from published sources; notes and extracts from English parish records related to Butterworth family (baptisms, marriages, burials); a family chart; photostats of original records; correspondence about genealogical research (much of it with people in England conducting research on Elsie Butterworth's behalf); an article about W. J. Butterworth C.B., Governor of Prince of Wales' Island, Singapore, and Malacca; photocopies of newspaper clippings; and a small number of original records, including a baptismal certificate and one photograph.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
